author: srimanob
body:
#### PR description:
This PR is to fix IB issue of D88 PU wfs, https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/36833#issuecomment-1028546775
In addition, this PR also disable D88 dd4hep wf, and update README.

#### PR validation:
- Test with 39434.21,39634.21,39634.9921,39634.99,39634.999

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:
- No need of backport.
title: Disable D88 PU wfs
